dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Karen undoes a last screw in a metal support. She pulls the handcuff through the gap between the support and railing. She's at the top of the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Curves and goes into the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tugs at the railing, tries rocking it up and down. It doesn't budge. She starts chipping at the plaster with the knife.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: God, I am really beginning to hate fine craftsmanship.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: It's up to her chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Sheriff hesitates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And just then they all hear something truly ominous -- a siren pierces the night.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Where is she?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They went back to her house.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where's her house?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's --
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: She reacts to the siren -- uh-oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The siren wails.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jim turns to look at Tom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom doesn't know what to do. The Sheriff looks pretty pleased with himself. He might just get out of this. And then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They all look over at...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What in God's name is that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hank?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (woozy but okay) It's topped out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How much time we got?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How should I know?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Guess!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's an old dam! Not long.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Tom) Then I'd say you boys better drop your guns.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's the deal! You let me and Hank go -- with a few of these bags -- and I'll tell you where to find Karen.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to the Sheriff) Get out of the boat.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hold on.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hold on?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's the only way you're gonna find her!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's only a couple of bags.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But I thought -- JIM Look, I don't know what you thought but I told you, I'm here for the money; that's all.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) She lives on Boyd Street.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Alive, but barely.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Three over. Two-story, blue shutters.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Looks at Jim, disappointed, angry, then hurries to Hank's boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Climbs into the Sheriff's boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Climbs into Hank's boat. He starts the engine, looks down at...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Floating in the water, dying. A brief look between them, then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drives the boat out through a shattered window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pushes the Sheriff out of the boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A large V is being cut in the top of the dam by the raging water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looking back at the dam. The line of lights on top of the dam start to fall over, then go dark, snuffed out by an unseen force.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jim keeps his gun leveled at the Sheriff and Hank, standing in the water, as he pulls the money bags up from the forward hold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jim opens a money bag and smiles at what he sees.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: So, you just gonna kill me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Lord knows I should.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Karen tilts her head back to keep her lips and nose above water. And then she hears a window smash. She turns as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wades in along the upper hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom reaches into the water for the railing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then they hear a sound more ominous than the siren -- they hear the siren stop.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm guessing you can't get up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm handcuffed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The railing's bolted to the wall.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've got a saw.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: In the kitchen. In the tall cupboard beside the --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is that good or bad?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Jim, the Sheriff and Hank react to the silence. Jim looks off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drops underwater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turns back at the sound of the Sheriff going under.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Sheriff pulls up his pant leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is aiming his gun at the water and is about to fire as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Comes out of the water shooting a pistol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is shot in the gut and the thigh and high on the chest and he stumbles back, bellowing, and falls out of the Sheriff's boat and into the water.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You should've just killed me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: You gotta go! Tom starts hyperventilating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom breathes deep then ducks underwater.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The dam's gone! You gotta go!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (shakes head) I owe you one.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Tom flicks on his flashlight and starts swimming down the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watches Tom and his light get swallowed up in the murky water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Phil is grabbing for the Sheriff's boat as the Sheriff and Hank zoom out of the church, leaving him behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Sheriff's boat comes onto Main Street, moving fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hank is looking back, in the direction the flood will come.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Sheriff pushes Hank out of the boat.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We gotta go faster!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, you're right.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Goes skipping over the water and slams into a streetlight post.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom swims down into the living room. His light shows a couch, chairs, TV set. Books and newspapers are suspended in the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The damaged ski-boat that Jim and Tom took to the church has slipped off the sandbag wall and is drifting. A peaceful scene. But then, from the distance, comes a rushing roar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Phil hears the roar. He looks around, lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hank, groggy in the water, also hears the distant roar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The roar is building, getting louder. Phil sees something in the water and reaches for it, frantically. He gets it. It's...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And he clutches it to his chest as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hits the church.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom swims into the kitchen. He looks for the tall cupboard by the fridge. He opens it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hanging on a hook on the back wall is a saw. Tom grabs it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hank unwraps himself from around the lamp post. He looks back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Streetlights in the distance, winking out one by one, marking the advance of the wall of water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hank looks around for safety. He sees it.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Oh my God.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: There's an alleyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Swims for the alley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roars through the town, pushing a rolling wave of debris, obliterating anything in its path.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hank swims into the alley. Hank looks for something to climb up on, to hold onto. There's...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At the end of the alley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Swims for it. He hears the rushing roar of the advancing flood. He expects the flood to blow by the end of the alley. Wrong.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Comes into the alley, banking high on the far wall before coming down and barreling toward Hank. And what makes it worse for Hank is that there's...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At the front of the wave, being pushed by the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dives clear just as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smashes into the wall, right where Hank had just been.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relief in his eyes. He gets to the fire escape and is climbing to safety when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Comes into the alley, rolling in the flood, spraying propane from a torn hose. It explodes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Barely has time to scream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom is threading his belt through the handle of the saw to secure it. He gets it done and starts to swim out of the kitchen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just Karen's lips and nose are above water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom is about to leave when everything starts to move -- rocking, from side to side, as if in a slow motion earthquake. Cupboards and the fridge open and bottles and food and plates tumble out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The house has been hit by the flood. It's being pulled by the massive current, stretching overhead phone and power lines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Karen hears the groaning, ripping as the house tears free from water and sewer lines. She's looking down for Tom when there's a snap and the light above her goes out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The house is carried on the current, turning in the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom watches, astounded, as the room starts to turn around him. He kicks fast for the door to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom swims in, fast, toward the stairs when...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Caves in and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smashes in, filling the room, blocking Tom's route to the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tries to get through the tangle of branches and leaves, but can't. He swims over to another window and slides it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keeps looking down for Tom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The house is impaled on a tree, the current sluicing around it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surfaces near the side of the house, gasping. The current starts ripping him past the house. He swims as hard as he can back to the house, reaches out and grabs onto a gutter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Karen doesn't have much time left. The water is washing over her mouth and nose. And just as she's about to go under...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Swims in with the saw. He starts sawing on the handrail. Everything's going fine. And then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snaps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at each other. Oh no. Karen's going under.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sees something. He dives into the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can only watch and wait. What's he doing? Oh, Jesus. And then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surfaces, holding Wayne's pistol. He puts the mouth of the barrel to the handcuff chain, shields Karen's face, looks away and pulls the trigger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The water swirls through the branches of a half-submerged tree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are in the tree. Henry is either unconscious or dead. Doreen cradles him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Henry starts to come to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Henry opens his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She hugs him tight and after a beat he hugs her back.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Come on, Henry. Forget that "Go to the light" crap. Come back to me. You're all I've got.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, Henry. Thank God.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Next time, when I say "Let's evacuate," we're gonna evacuate.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whatever you say, honey.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Tom and Karen swim out of a second floor window, grab the rain gutter. Tom pulls himself onto the roof then grabs Karen and helps her up. They crawl until they're clear of the edge. Only the sloped roof of the house is visible in the swirling water. They are just catching their breath when they are hit by...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And they look to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In his boat, shining a searchlight on them with one hand, a gun in the other. He starts shooting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom pushes Karen toward the peak of the roof as the bullets plug in around them. Tom pushes Karen over the top then turns and dives off the roof and into the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hears an engine behind her and turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Racing toward the house. It's...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And at the controls is...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Barely alive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is wobbling, vibrating at the back of the boat, almost loose from its moorings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He sees Karen, crouched below the peak of the house, a bright light coming from the other side along with gunshots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pushes the throttle all the way forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoots forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom swims hard toward the Sheriff's boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is shooting down into the water at Tom's moving shape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With Jim at the wheel, comes racing straight toward the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thinks he's going to turn.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: No! No!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Doesn't turn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rolls to the side, just getting clear as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hits the sloping roof of Karen's house and ramps up it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Digs into the shingles of the roof and tears free from the back of the boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hears the sound and looks up as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Comes over the peak of the roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surfaces to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fly right over him, heading straight for...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who ducks down, just in time as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Misses him, landing just past him in the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Straightens up, grinning with glee that the boat missed him. And then he hears a piercing whine coming from behind him. He turns, just in time to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flipping end over end, propeller whirring, heading straight for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Starts to scream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looking over the peak of the roof in horror. She hears the Sheriff's scream and the scream of the propeller and then a horrible ugly ripping and both screams stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Sheriff is gone. The side has been smashed out of the boat and the boat is flooding with water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is just some misshapen thing trailing red, floating in the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tries to restart the ski-boat but it's dead. He slumps forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sees Jim slump against the side of the boat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom can tell Jim's anything but. Tom swims for the boat.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: You okay?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Fine.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Tom swims up, pulls himself in. He pulls Jim back off the controls, sees the blood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jim looks at Tom. Tom understands -- Jim's not going anywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom looks at Jim -- he knows Jim's lying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jim lets go of Tom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jim grimaces as he's hit by a wave of pain. He looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom hesitates for a second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom turns and slides into the water and swims away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a last look between Jim and Tom, then Tom swims away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jim slowly topples forward and is still.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, God. We gotta get you to --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thanks.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: For what?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You just saved our lives.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I did? I just came for the money.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Do you need any help?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (grabs Tom's arm) No. Tell her to stay back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Karen) It's okay!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're going to turn it in?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sorry to disappoint you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, hell, then I guess I better take it after all. I figure the river'll carry me down to the Gulf of Mexico. If I catch the right currents, maybe I'll end up in... Belize? (Tom nods) You come look me up. I'll buy you a drink.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'll do that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Go.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Please.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Son, don't think too badly of your Uncle Charlie. He always said you were capable of remarkable things. (beat) He was right.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiles) The rain's stopped. (breathes deep) The air after a rain...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Swims through the swirling current toward Karen's roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sinks below the surface and is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Karen is down at the water's edge with her arm extended to Tom. Tom grabs it, and as Karen pulls...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Karen pulls Tom up onto scaffolding running along the edge of the new roof under construction. Tom holds a paper bag. He's wearing work gear -- tool belt, work boots, etc. Tom looks at the work being done on the roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And as they sit down and start to eat, the camera begins to PULL BACK.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: They got a lot done today.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's coming along. (re: bag) What'd you get?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Barbecue chicken from Lilly's.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yum.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You want some? I wish you'd told me. I woulda got more.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ha ha.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I talked to Mikey. He says the flooring should be in by Friday.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's what he said last week.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I said if it wasn't here by Friday at six that you were going to go over and beat the crap out of him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And I will.
dialogue.name: dialogue
